overview:
Han “Sup” Yoon is a Korean-American entrepreneur who has had a passion for web development and programming at an early age.

Han is most well known for his first business exit, at age 15 in 2008, in which he sold his third party Microsoft Zune-related community, ZuneBoards, for $62,000.

He is now the CEO of a web development and consulting company, Spuxy Studios, which was featured on many media publications, like OC Register and Boston Herald, for offering web services at a discounted rate to local small businesses.
